CustomField.formula: if( ISPICKVAL(amc__Project_Day_Rate__c, "Standard"), amc__Billable_Hourly_Rate__c * amc__Hours_Actual__c, ( amc__Hours_Completed_Cost__c + amc__Hours_Remaining_Cost__c) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provides a cost summary based on the Hours Completed + Hours Remaining. (Previously Labelled Cost Forecast)
CustomField.label: Billable Forecast
